skill.name: cost-optimization
skill.description: Optimize cloud costs through resource rightsizing, tagging strategies, reserved instances, and spending analysis. Use when reducing cloud expenses, analyzing infrastructure costs, or implementing cost governance policies.
skill.summary: Optimize cloud costs through resource rightsizing, tagging strategies, reserved instances, and spend...
skill.author: wshobson

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and code examples. No executable code, no network calls, no filesystem access beyond reading its own files, no environment variable access, and no external command execution.

content.value_statement: Cloud spending can quickly grow out of control. This skill provides proven strategies for reducing costs through rightsizing, reserved capacity, and automation patterns across AWS, Azure, and GCP.
actual_capabilities: Analyze resource utilization and identify over-provisioned resources
Recommend appropriate pricing models (reserved instances, spot, savings plans)
Create tagging strategies for cost allocation and tracking
Design Terraform configurations for cost-optimized infrastructure
Set up budget alerts and cost monitoring dashboards
limitations: Cannot access real cloud account data or credentials
Cannot provide real-time cost estimates without input data
Recommendations are based on general best practices

use_cases.title: Reduce Monthly Cloud Bills
use_cases.description: Identify cost-saving opportunities and implement optimization strategies across multi-cloud environments.

use_cases.title: Design Cost-Efficient Architecture
use_cases.description: Select appropriate pricing models and design patterns that balance performance with cost efficiency.

use_cases.title: Implement Cost Governance
use_cases.description: Establish tagging standards, budget alerts, and cost allocation strategies for organizational accountability.

prompt_templates.title: Rightsize Resources
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me right-size my AWS EC2 instances. I have a t3.2xlarge running at 20% CPU utilization. What recommendations do you have?

prompt_templates.title: Choose Pricing Model
prompt_templates.prompt: I have a production database that runs 24/7 with steady usage. Compare reserved instances versus savings plans on AWS.

prompt_templates.title: Tagging Strategy
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a tagging strategy for my multi-team organization. Include recommended tags for environment, cost center, and owner.

prompt_templates.title: Budget Alerts
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a Terraform configuration for an AWS budget that alerts me when monthly spending exceeds 80% of my $2000 budget.

output_examples.input: How can I optimize my S3 storage costs?
output: Implement S3 lifecycle policies to transition data automatically
Use S3 Standard for frequently accessed data (first 30 days)
Move to S3 Standard-IA for infrequently accessed data (30-90 days)
Archive to S3 Glacier for long-term storage (90+ days)
Consider S3 Intelligent-Tiering for automated cost optimization
Delete unused objects and incomplete multipart uploads

best_practices: Use cost allocation tags to track spending by team, project, and environment
Implement auto-scaling to match capacity with actual demand
Review and optimize costs weekly using cloud provider cost analysis tools
anti_patterns: Leaving idle resources running without cleanup processes
Using on-demand pricing for predictable, steady workloads
Ignoring unused resources like unattached EBS volumes or elastic IPs

faq.question: Does this skill access my cloud accounts?
faq.answer: No. This skill provides guidance and examples only. You must provide any account data manually.

faq.question: What cloud platforms are supported?
faq.answer: This skill covers AWS, Azure, and GCP with specific guidance for each platform.

faq.question: Can it make changes to my infrastructure?
faq.answer: No. This skill generates code examples and recommendations. You review and apply them yourself.

faq.question: How much can I save using these strategies?
faq.answer: Savings vary by workload. Typical savings range from 30% to 72% with reserved capacity.

faq.question: Does this skill store any data?
faq.answer: No. This is a prompt-based skill that processes queries in your current session only.

faq.question: How does this compare to third-party tools?
faq.answer: This skill provides strategic guidance. Third-party tools like CloudHealth offer deeper automation.
